#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation
_Create a new Mapinfo instace_
{{{
 COMMapinfo mapinfo = new MapinfoFactory().CreateCOMInstance();
}}}

_Opening a table_
{{{
 Table table = Table.OpenTable(mapinfo,@"c:\Temp\TestTable.Tab");
}}}
_or_
{{{
 Table<TestEntity> table = Table.OpenTable<TestEntity>(mapinfo,@"C:\Temp\TestTable.Tab");
        
 //where TestEntity is:
 public class TestEntity : BaseEntity
 {
    public int AssetId {get;set;}
    public string AssetName {get;set;}
 }
}}}

_Using LINQ against a table_
{{{
  IQueryable<TestEntity> query = from row in table
				 where row.AssetName == "TestAsset"
				 select row;
}}}
_Using LINQ against a table(mapping to anonymous type)
{{{
  var query2 = from row in table
	       select new {id = row.AssetId, name = row.AssetName};
       
  foreach(var item in query2)
  {
      Console.WriteLine("{0} || {1}",item.id,item.name);
  }
}}}
